title: CCTV Captures Grenade Attack In Crowded Srinagar Market, 1 Dead, 23 Injured - NDTV
content: CCTV Captures Grenade Attack In Crowded Srinagar Market, 1 Dead, 23 Injured  NDTVView Full coverage on Google News
description: A man was killed and at least 23 others injured after terrorists threw a grenade in the middle of a busy marketplace in Srinagar on Sunday in an attack that was caught on security cameras.
